name: Air Jordan 1 Royal Blue
description: The very first colorway released to the public, the Air Jordan 1 Royal Blue was Michael Jordan’s personal favorite.

name: Air Jordan 1 Black Toe
description: One of the debut AJ-1 colorways, the Black Toe remains one of the sneaker’s most iconic and beloved designs.

name: Air Jordan 1 BRED/Banned
description: The BRED or Banned colorway of the Air Jordan 1 is the only sneaker that could be classified as “badass.”

name: Air Jordan 1 UNC/Carolina Blue
description: Not quite as rare as some of the other first-year colorways, the UNC remains one of the prettiest pairs of Air Jordan 1s

name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Chicago Lost & Found'
description: The Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG ‘Chicago Lost & Found’ brings back the iconic silhouette that started it all.

name: Zion Williamson x Air Jordan 1 Retro Low OG 'Voodoo'
description: The Zion Williamson x Air Jordan 1 Retro Low OG ‘Voodoo’ shares a New Orleans-inspired theme with a companion Zion 2 colorway from June 2022.

name: Off-White x Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'UNC' Sample
description: A new twist to the classic Air Jordan University.

name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Stage Haze'
description: The Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG ‘Stage Haze’ features neutral tones on the foundational sneaker that started it all.

name: Air Jordan 1 Mid 'Smoke Grey'
description: The Air Jordan 1 Mid ‘Smoke Grey’ delivers an entirely neutral iteration of the classic silhouette.

name: Travis Scott x Air Jordan 1 Low OG 'Reverse Mocha'
description: The Travis Scott x Air Jordan 1 Low OG ‘Reverse Mocha’ delivers a twist on the original ‘Mocha’ AJ1 Low from 2019.

name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High '85 'Georgetown'
description: Restored with a heritage build, the Air Jordan 1 Retro High ‘85 ‘Georgetown’ features a familiar two-tone design that celebrates the 40th anniversary of Michael Jordan’s title-clinching shot against the Hoyas on March 29, 1982.

name: Air Jordan 1 High Element Gore-Tex 'Light Bone'
description: A rugged take on the classic Air Jordan 1, incorporating Gore-Tex technology.
